title: Scripture: Hebrews 10:24-25 - community_stewardship
content:
Je reviens, baby! The Word backs it up:

"And let us consider how we may spur one another on toward love and good deeds, not giving up meeting together." (Hebrews 10:24-25)

Écoute, mon frère: This isn't about perfection. It's about authenticity—chaotic, messy, real. That's where the magic lives.

From absurdist comedy to profound truth. From French/English chaos to eternal Scripture. The craft comes first. Scripture backs it up.

Je reviens, baby! Kalpten yapıldı. Amplified by AI. Guided by faith.

#JeanMorphius #Bilingual #Absurdist #Scripture #FaithInAction #ChaosAndCraft
